name: HLVRAIRPGEE
description:
(Half Life but the AI is sentient; Role Playing Game, Enhanced Edition - Demastered)

HLVRAI's "intro" remade in RPGMAKER MZ.

This is a fan project made over the course of the program's free trial just to figure out how it works n stuff. I'm not affiliated with the radiotvsolutions guys yada yada, go watch hlvrai, and sub at those places and more.

The game consists of the “intro section” of act 1: about 10 minutes, or up until the reactor failure, but comes to about 20 minutes of actual play time. Funny how that works out.

This is presented "as is" and will not be updated. I don't have the free trial anymore.

Quick  “Dev” notes.

  • Saving and reloading while midway through an “event” may cause npcs to reset to original positions. While weird, it shouldn’t impede progress. You could probably use this to spawn infinite coomers if you wanted.  Nice.
  • In the “benrey follows” segments, benrey may physically block the player’s movement and force a restart/ reload.

Just don’t let him get in front of you, I guess. :)
